message.content:
Here's a detailed breakdown of the information in the form and the corresponding JSON file:

**Form Elements Breakdown:**

1. **Form Title and Instructions:**
   - Title: EXECUTIVE DOCUMENT SUMMARY
   - Instructions:
     1. Please read the guidelines on the back of this form.
     2. Please type all information.
     3. Check all boxes that apply.
     4. For amendments/renewals, attach original EDS.
     5. Attach additional pages if necessary.

2. **Dates:**
   - Date Prepared: 12/1/2016

3. **Form Identification Numbers:**
   - IDS Number: D25-7-90950

4. **Contracts & Leases:**
   - Type: Professional/Personal Services (checked)
     - Options: Contract for procured Services (checked)
   - Grant: Unchecked
   - Lease: Unchecked
   - Maintenance: Unchecked
   - License Agreement: Unchecked
   - Attorney: Unchecked
   - Amendment: Unchecked
   - MOU: Unchecked
   - Renewal #: Unchecked
   - QPA: Unchecked
   - Other: Unchecked

5. **Agency Information:**
   - Name of Agency: Department of Correction
   - Address: Central Office, 302 W. WASHINGTON, INDIANAPOLIS, IN 46204
   - Requisition Number: Not provided

6. **Agency Contact Information:**
   - Name: John Nally
   - Telephone #: 317/233-3111
   - Email Address: Jhnally@idoc.in.gov

7. **Fiscal Information:**
   - Account Number: 1370716000
   - Educational Services: Checked
   - Total Amount this EDS: $18,178,461.36

     - 2017: $4,589,615.34
     - 2018: $6,089,234.68
     - 2019: $4,589,611.78

8. **Time Period Covered in this EDS:**
   - From: 11/2017
   - To: 12/31/2018

9. **Selection Method:**
   - RFP#: 16-080 (checked)
   - Method of source selection: RFP
     - Options: Emergency: Unchecked, Special Procurement: Unchecked
   - Other (specified): Not provided

10. **Processing Information:**
    - Will the attached document involve data processing or telecommunications system: No
    - Secretary Authority (Cite Applicable Indiana or Federal Codes): 11-13-2-5 ET.AL
    - If there is "Termination for Convenience" clause in the document: Yes (checked)

11. **Miscellaneous:** 
    - Is this contract submitted late: No
    - Justifications of vendor selection and determination of price reasonableness:
      - The vendor was the successful respondent to the Stateâ€™s RFF 16-080.
    - Description of work and justification for expending money:
      - This contract is for adult education services at all IDOC adult facilities and juvenile educational services at the Madison Juvenile Correctional Facility.

12. **Courier Information:**
    - Name: Nicholas Law
    - Telephone #: 317-232-5672
    - Email Address: Nlaw@idoa.in.gov

13. **Vendor Information:**

    - Address: 138 N LUCRETIA ST, OAKLAND CITY, IN 47660
    - Telephone #: 812-749-1210
    - Email Address: kycager@oak.edu
    - Primary Vendor: MWBE/VI/Women: Yes (checked)
    - Out of State Contracts must be registered: Yes (checked)
    - Primary Vendor Percentages: Minority: Yes (checked), 13%
    - Women: Yes (checked), 1.2%
    - IN-Veteran: Yes (checked), 0.4%
    - Sub Vendor MWBE/VI/Veteran: UN-Veteran: Yes (checked)

14. **Approval Information:**

    - Date Approved
